html:
I know when I end
And where the reality begins
Flowers bloom beautifully
In all of the gardens
Bees do their work
This is just something they do
Sun drops bright light
Everywhere around
Some want to give medals
Some want to rob me instead
I’m loosing a part
A part of my freedom
And maybe one night
When moon shines bright
I’ll kiss a beauty like her
Like fire that blazes straws
title: Moon
